Articles.Content:
EDIT: SORRY! I just saw another post about this. I don't know how to delete this one though so mods feel free to.

I searched the forums to make sure this wasn't already mentioned so forgive me if it was but is anyone else absolutely STOKED for the Interstellar Movie coming out this November!? They recently came out with a new trailer and it looks absolutely incredible. Here's the link:

Near the end, it looks as though they are traveling through some sort of wormhole/black hole which is epic. Is anyone else excited for this movie besides me?
